MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL46 & LL47  postcode areas of Harlech and Talsarnau , affecting properties in the local area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:03 PM on 6th November 2020..
